ol.li:
SHALL contain exactly one [1..1] code, which SHALL be selected from (CodeSystem: 2.16.840.1.113883.6.12 CPT-4) (CONF:56)
This code is used to specify that the section in question documents ED activities. Relevant CPT codes are 99281 - 99285

contain exactly one [1..1] id1 with @xsi:type="II"
This id is the reference to be used in all ED observation Act References to associate the observation with its context
